original_text: Behold, I have created the smith that bloweth the coals in the fire, and that bringeth forth an instrument for his work; and I have created the waster to destroy.
korean_text: 보라 숯불을 불어서 자기가 쓸 만한 연장을 제조하는 장인도 내가 창조하였고 파괴하며 진멸하는 자도 내가 창조하였은즉

sentences.original_text: Behold, I have created the smith
that bloweth the coals in the fire
and that bringeth forth an instrument for his work
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 일을 위한 기구를 만드는 자를

sentences.original_text: and I have created the waster
